Text:
NOTES: Before you install this software----- Use your firewall or disconnect your internet. or else your installation will become useless within seconds of you installing this software.

serial inside torrent
you must insert your usb flash drive into your computer and locate the drive during installation
Can't find the serial, not in the torrent..
Traders-- the serial is inside USBSecure14_mpt folder.once you open the folder. there is a MSinfo inside, right click on it and choose to open with note pad. it will open. and the serial is inside
I have heard about tools like these where the user intended the drive to be so secure that he forgot the password himself!
Sven the swede --- why will you forget your pasword? alway input your first name and date of birth as your password. this is not rocket science

BLACKTROY_ Finally found the serial, Thanks for the help,

 have been looking for something like this for months, Cheers. PS. this works a treat.
